Main Page | Modules | File List | File Members

gs-sdk-msclient

Introduction

Ubi.com master server list interface

Description

This sdk provides functionalities for a game developper to add game server listing mechanism in his project. This system works by connecting on all Ubi.com lobbies and retrieving the list of game servers for the game requested.
